issue.title: [C++] Add Parquet-Arrow roundtrip tests for nested data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10057](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10057). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need hand-written non-trivial roundtrip tests for nested data.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10057?focusedCommentId=17205957) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
